Body:
self.model = CrossEntropyMNL(solver='lbfgs', fit_intercept=True, est_stderr
    =True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0.1, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100,
    coef=None, stderr=None, n_classes=None)
self.model.fit(self.data_spector.exog[4:6, :], self.y_disturbed[4:6,],
    sample_weight=0.5)
self.assertEqual(self.model.coef.shape, (1, 4))
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_spector.exog[4:6, :], self.y_disturbed[4:6,]), np.array([-0.503, -
    0.662]), decimal=3)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_spector.exog[4:6, :], np.array([[0, 0], [0.99, 0.01]])), np.array(
    [-np.Infinity, -0.662]), decimal=3)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.loglike_per_sample(self.
    data_spector.exog[4:6, :], np.array([[0, 0], [0.01, 0.99]])), np.array(
    [-np.Infinity, -0.725]), decimal=3)
